entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 12:49 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
